==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あし|もと}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あしもと|足|tr1=ashi|t1=foot, feet|元|tr2=moto|t2=base; foundation; origin}}. Note that the ''moto'' portion can be spelled variously as {{m|ja|元}}, {{m|ja|下}}, or {{m|ja|許}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あしもと|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|足元}}, {{ja-l|足許}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あしもと}}

# at one's [[feet]], [[underfoot]], the [[ground]]
#: {{ja-usex|地震で'''足下'''が揺れた。|^じしん で '''あしもと''' が ゆれた。|'''The ground underfoot''' shook from the earthquake.}}
# the [[bottom]] of the [[foot]]
# a [[foothold]], one's [[footing]]
#: {{ja-usex|この事業では、'''足下'''を固めてから、やっと発動できるようになります。|^この じぎょう で は、 '''あしもと''' を かためて から、 やっと はつどう できる よう に なります。|We will finally be able to get moving once we have established a firm '''footing''' on this project.}}
# [[gait]], [[pace]], [[step]]
# someone's [[surroundings]], the [[nearby]]
# [[recent]] [[event]]s
#: {{ja-usex|'''足下'''の業績は好調に推移している。|^'''あしもと''' の ぎょうせき は こうちょう に すい.い して いる。|Recent earnings have been trending favourably.}}
# a [[post]] in the [[structure]] of a [[house]]: a vertical support running from the [[foundation]] to the [[roof]] [[joist]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=あしもと|theatre}} [[hakama]], [[trousers]], [[leg]] [[covering]]s in general
# {{lb|ja|sort=あしもと|theatre}} [[footlight]]s in the [[backstage]] area to illuminate [[walkway]]s
# during the [[rice]] [[harvest]], any [[grain]] that falls at one's feet
# a [[fin]], as of a fish, a seal, or similar marine animal

=====Synonyms=====
{{der-top|Synonyms}}
* {{sense|the ground}} {{ja-r|地面|じめん}}
* {{sense|where one stands}} {{ja-r|立場|たちば}}
* {{sense|foothold, footing}} {{ja-r|足場|あしば}}
* {{sense|gait, how one walks}} {{ja-r|歩き方|あるきかた}}
* {{sense|step, how one places their feet}} {{ja-r|足付き|あしつき}}
* {{sense|recent events}} {{ja-r|最近|さいきん}} {{qualifier|more immediate}}, {{ja-r|近頃|ちかごろ}} {{qualifier|less formal}}
* {{sense|structural post}} {{ja-r|柱|はしら}}, {{ja-r|通し柱|とおしばしら}}
* {{sense|leg coverings in general}} {{ja-r|履物|はきもの}}
* {{sense|fin}} {{ja-r|鰭|ひれ}}
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あ|もと}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あもと|足|tr1=a|t1=foot, feet|pos1=older combining form of modern ''ashi''|元|tr2=moto|t2=base; foundation; origin}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あもと}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|足元}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あもと}}

# at one's feet, [[underfoot]]
# one's [[family]] and [[status]], where one stands in the world

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|足下正し|あもと ただし}}: to be of proper [[breeding]], to have a solid [[pedigree]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{der-top|Synonyms}}
* {{sense|family status}} {{ja-r|家柄|いえがら}}
* {{sense|personal status, identity}} {{ja-r|身分|みぶん}}
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|そく|k1=そっ|か}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=そっか}} {{m|zh|足下|tr=tsjowk hæ<sup>X</sup>|lit=foot + down, beneath}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''zuk<sup>1</sup> haa<sup>6</sup>''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|そっか|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|そっか}}

# at one's feet, [[underfoot]]
# an [[epithet]] used in written [[correspondence]] to show respect to the [[addressee]]
# a [[pair]] of high [[clogs]], worn in rainy weather

=====Synonyms=====
{{der-top|Synonyms}}
* {{sense|rain clogs}} {{ja-r|足駄|あしだ}}
{{der-bottom}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|そっか}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=そっか|formal|archaic}} second-person pronoun: [[you]]
#: Used to refer to someone of similar or lower status than the speaker. From the sense of being {{m|en|nearby}} in status.
